nodes.text: Blue Ten was the call sign of the tenth member of Blue Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several pilots went by the call sign Blue Ten.
Blue Ten was the call sign of Tetengo Noor when he flew with General Edor Crespin's Blue Squadron, participating in the Battle of Folor under that call sign.

In the novelization of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope, a member of Luke Skywalker's squadron, identified as Blue Squadron, uses the call sign Blue Ten. However, in the film, Skywalker's squadron is Red Squadron.
